intervention_catalogue.name: Becoming New Me Plus: general violence offence
intervention_catalogue.short_description: Becoming New Me Plus (BNM+) uses cognitive behavioural therapy. It is for men who are at high or very high risk of reoffending. This strand is for men convicted of a general violence offence.
intervention_catalogue.long_description: Becoming New Me Plus (BNM+) uses cognitive behavioural therapy. It is for men who are at high or very high risk of reoffending. This strand is for men convicted of a general violence offence.
intervention_catalogue.session_detail:
Group and one-to-one in person. 

85 group sessions + 7 individual sessions.


Alternatively, sessions can be exclusively one-to-one with a minimum of 20 sessions (depending on the needs of the individual).

possible_outcomes: assist participant to desist from crime
